newsitem.title: UK: LIFFE coffee inches up, sugar at contract high AM.
newsitem.headline: LIFFE coffee inches up, sugar at contract high AM.

text.p: COFFEE - Inches higher in slow start to the week. Sept up $10 at $1,600 at 1001 GMT on tiny volume of 279 lots.
COCOA - Gaps higher as expected, then reverses on lack of follow-through support. Sept down five stg at 987 stg.
SUGAR - Holds recent strength. Oct nudges higher to hit new life-of-contract high of $331.00, up $2.30 on the day.
